summary: Build a modern, scalable e-commerce website with storefront + admin panel, mobile-friendly/SEO/performance, using Stripe for online payments (with simulated offline UPI/net banking/COD options), Internet Identity authentication, and simple status-based order tracking. Top-level categories are limited to Clothes, Jewellery, and Fragrances (Beauty and Health & Wellness removed site-wide).
architectural_notes: Payments: implement Stripe for online payments; support UPI/net banking/COD as simulated/manual payment methods managed by admin.
Authentication: use Internet Identity for both customer and admin login.
Order tracking: simple internal status-based tracking; no external courier API integration.
Non-functional requirements: mobile-first responsive UI, fast loading, SEO optimized, secure payments, scalable architecture.
Branding: header should display the uploaded logo plus a styled “Mixora” wordmark aligned with the site’s premium typography.

Catalog scope: remove Beauty and Health & Wellness categories site-wide (storefront routes/nav, admin category management, and any seeded data); keep only Clothes, Jewellery, and Fragrances as top-level categories.

existing_features.title: Create the storefront information architecture and routing for a multi-category e-commerce site with: Home, Category listing, Product detail, Cart, Checkout, Wishlist, Orders (order tracking), Account/Login, and Support pages.

Implement a coherent premium visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) across the entire UI, aligned with a modern stylish marketplace aesthetic, while remaining fast and mobile-friendly. Do not use a blue+purple default theme.
Build the Home page with promotional hero banners, offer sections, and featured categories (at least the 6 top-level categories provided), with fast-loading responsive layout.

Implement category-wise product listing pages, including navigation across top-level categories and subcategories, and basic client-side filters/sorting (e.g., price sort, in-stock, variant availability where applicable).

Implement product detail pages with: image gallery, price, description, selectable size/color variants (when available), review list + review submission (authenticated), and add-to-cart/add-to-wishlist actions.
Implement cart functionality: add/update/remove items, quantity changes, variant display, price totals, and persistence per user (principal) with a guest fallback stored locally until login.

Implement checkout flow with shipping/contact form, order summary, and payment method selection where: Stripe is the only real online payment; UPI/net banking/COD are represented as offline/manual payment options handled by admin.

Add Internet Identity authentication for customers and admins; expose account pages showing basic profile (principal) and user-specific sections (orders, wishlist). Admin access must require an admin role.
Implement simple status-based order tracking: Placed → Packed → Shipped → Delivered (and optionally Cancelled), visible to customers and manageable by admins.
Implement a wishlist feature allowing authenticated users to add/remove products and view their wishlist; provide clear UI affordances from listing and product detail pages.

Create an admin panel UI and backend endpoints to manage: categories (and subcategories), products (including images, variants, inventory/pricing), orders (status updates, manual payment marking), and users/admin role assignment.
Add customer support entry points: a contact form (stored/submitted to backend for admin review) and a WhatsApp link/button (configurable phone number) shown in Support page and/or site footer.
Implement baseline SEO and performance best practices: per-page titles/meta where applicable, accessible headings, optimized images, and fast client-side navigation with sensible loading states.
Add required generated static images to support a premium storefront look and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve generated images through the backend).
Add the uploaded logo file "Green and Cream Elegant Saree Fashion Logo.png" as a static frontend asset and render it as the storefront header brand mark.
Update the existing BrandMark component to use the uploaded logo instead of the current generated placeholder logo and ensure the header layout remains visually balanced on mobile and desktop.
Add the brand name text “Mixora” as a styled wordmark alongside the existing logo in the main site header, ensuring the combined brand lockup remains visually balanced on mobile and desktop.

Remove Beauty and Health & Wellness from all storefront navigation and category surfaces, keeping only Clothes, Jewellery, and Fragrances visible to users (header navigation, mobile menu, footer links, and featured categories grid).

Update category-related page metadata and labels so that category names/descriptions do not mention Beauty or Health & Wellness anywhere in customer-facing UI text (including Home page meta description/hero copy and Category listing page labels).
Ensure removed categories are not accessible through normal UI flows and that direct navigation to removed category IDs does not present them as valid categories.

new_feature_requests.summary: Storefront: home page with banners/offers/featured categories
Catalog browsing: category-wise product listing and filters/navigation
Product detail pages: images, price, description, reviews, size/color variants
Payments: Stripe integration plus simulated offline options (UPI/net banking/COD) handled manually
User accounts via Internet Identity for customers and admins
Order tracking with simple status workflow (Placed→Packed→Shipped→Delivered)
Admin panel to manage products, categories, orders, and users
Customer support: contact form and WhatsApp contact entry point

Define the backend data model and APIs for: Categories (with subcategories), Products (with images, price, description, inventory, size/color variants), Reviews, Carts, Wishlists, Orders, Order items, Users (Internet Identity principals), and Admin role/permissions.
Seed the application with initial data for the six top-level categories and a small set of example products across categories to demonstrate end-to-end browsing, cart, and checkout.
Add the provided/uploaded logo asset to the storefront site header (branding in navigation bar)
Populate/seed product catalog content based on product names from an external website (requires URL or list of product names)
Branding: add site header brand name text “Mixora” styled as a wordmark (matching theme typography) alongside the existing logo
Catalog scope change: remove Health & Wellness and Beauty categories completely across the site (storefront + admin), leaving only Clothes, Jewellery, and Fragrances

Update the backend categories returned by `getCategories()` to remove Health & Wellness and Beauty categories completely, and ensure only the three top-level categories remain available site-wide: Clothes, Jewellery, and Fragrances.

projectName: Multi-category e-commerce storefront + admin panel with Stripe checkout, Internet Identity login, wishlist, and order tracking
